summary: 1.9 will remove the nude courier bug. now all hte couriers will deliver messages with nothing but a hat and a smile
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=Gold][size=7]Nothing but a hat[/size][/color][/center] 
[line]
[center][color=Gold][size=4]by Bwins95[/size][/color][/center] 
[color=Gold][size=3]Version             :[/size][/color]Latest version on the web...
[color=Gold][size=3]Date                :[/size][/color]08/13/2012
[color=Gold][size=3]Category            :[/size][/color]Clothing
[line] 
[line] 

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]1.9 will remove the nude courier bug. now all the couriers will deliver messages with nothing but a hat and a smile[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]These are the hats that will be randomly chosen for each courier.
ClothesBeggarHat
ClothesChefHat
ClothesFarmHat01
ClothesFarmHat02
ClothesFarmHat03
ClothesFineHat02
ClothesMerchantHat
ClothesMournerHat
ClothesNocturnalHat
DBClothesJesterHat
[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Location[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Where ever a courier appears.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]History[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
1
Upload. 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Contact[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Message me here.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Extract the esp and drop in the Skyrim Data folder.[center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Download it to the manager and check the box next to it.
[center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Delete esp.


[center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Disable the mod and delete from NMM.
[center] 
[line]

[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url] 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] 
[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on the steam network.
[*][url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]7Zip[/url] 
[/list] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Future Plans[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Maybe a female courier version.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Recommended Mods[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]One of the many nude male bodies.[/center] 
[line]
